Package gewebe.sandbox.sunflowapiapi

Class SunflowShader

java.lang.Object
gewebe.sandbox.sunflowapiapi.SunflowShader
public class SunflowShader extends Object
This class is the container for sunflow shaders It makes it easyer handling and setting them from processing

      bright - Highlight Color
      dark - Dark Color
      samples - Detail, the higher the slower and smoother
      maxDist - ?

      public void setWardShader(Color diffuse, Color specular, float roughnessX, float roughnessY, int samples)
      Sets Anisotropic Ward Shader
      Parameters:
      diffuse - Diffuse Color
      specular - Specular Color
      roughnessX - Roughness in x axis
      roughnessY - Roughness in y axis
      samples - Detail, the more the slower and smoother
